string: 1) Single-cell suspensions were prepared as previously described for generation of cerebral organoids \(Lancaster and Knoblich, 2014b) using human pluripotent stem cells \(hPSCs) cultured in either feeder-dependent or feeder free conditions.
refer: The phrase "as previously described" refers to the method of preparing single-cell suspensions for the generation of cerebral organoids, as described in a previous publication by Lancaster and Knoblich in 2014b.
